page-stablecoins-accordion-borrow-crypto: Tare da Ethereum zaku iya aro kai tsaye daga wasu masu amfani ba tare da cinikin ETH ɗin ku ba. Wannan na iya ba ku girmaa- wasu suna yin haka don ƙoƙarin tara ƙarin ETH.

Amma saboda farashin ETH ba yawa, kuna buƙatar haɓaka haɗin gwiwa. Wannan yana nufin idan kuna son aron stablecoins guda 100 tabbas kuna buƙatar ƙimar ETH aƙalla $ 150. Wannan yana kare tsarin da masu ba da bashi.
Ƙarin bayani game da stablecoins da ke kiripto
page-stablecoins-accordion-borrow-places: Waɗannan dapps suna ba ku damar aro stablecoins ta amfani da kiripto azaman abin dogaro. Wasu suna karɓar wasu kuɗi da ETH.
page-stablecoins-accordion-borrow-requir: Kana buƙatar walet don amfani da dapp
Kana buƙatar ETH don biyan kuɗi da/ko kuɗin kasuwanci
Dole kayi amfani da dapp ɗin da ya dace wajen rancen stablecoins. Kana kuma buƙatar walet da wasu ETH.
page-stablecoins-accordion-borrow-risks-: Idan ka yi amfani da ETH a matsayin jingina sannan ƙimar sa ta faɗi, haɗin gwiwar jinginar ku ba zai rufe stablecoins da kuka ƙirƙira ba. Wannan zai sa ETH ɗin ku ya lalace kuma kuna iya fuskantar hukunci. Don haka idan kun karɓi stablecoins kuna buƙatar kallon farashin ETH.
page-stablecoins-accordion-borrow-text-p: Kana iya amsa rancen stablecoins ta hanyar amfani da kiripto a matsayin jingina, wanda dole za ka biya daga baya.
page-stablecoins-accordion-buy-requireme: Cinikayyar kiripto da walet masu yawa
Binciki ayyukan da za ka iya amfani da su a inda kake da zama

Asusun na haɗe da musaya ko walat da za ka iya siyan crypto daga ciki kai tsaye. Wataƙila kun riga kun yi amfani da ɗaya don samun ETH. Bincika don ganin waɗanna ayyuka za ku iya amfani da su a inda kuke zama.
page-stablecoins-accordion-buy-text-prev: Da yawa daga cikin walat suna ba ku damar siyan stablecoins kai tsaye. Za a yi amfani da iyakancewa na yanki.
page-stablecoins-accordion-buy-warning: Musanya na ko'ina na iya jera stablecoins kamar USDC, Tether, da sauransu. Wataƙila ba za ku iya siyan su kai tsaye ba, amma ya kamata ku iya musanya su daga ETH ko wasu cryptocurrencies waɗanda zaku iya siya akan dandamali.
page-stablecoins-accordion-earn-project-: Yawancin aikin fasaha don motsin manhaja mai buɗewa.
Fasaha, ƙunshin bayani, da sauran ayyuka don al'ummar MakerDao (ƙungiyar da ta kawo muku Dai).
A Lokacin da kuka san asalin kayanku, zaku iya nemo masalaha don samun Dai.
page-stablecoins-accordion-earn-projects: Akwai dandalin kala-kala da zasu na biyan ka da stablecoins idan ka musu aiki.
Wurin da za a samu stablecoins
page-stablecoins-accordion-earn-requirem: Kana buƙatar walet don amsar stablecoins
Stablecoins hanya ce mafi kyau na biyan kuɗi don aiki da ayyuka saboda ƙimar ta tabbata. Amma kuna buƙatar walat don biya.
page-stablecoins-accordion-earn-text-pre: Kuna iya samun stablecoins ta hanyar aiki a ayyukan dake cikin yanayin muhalli na Ethereum.
page-stablecoins-accordion-swap-dapp-int: Idan ka riga da ka sami ETH da wallet, za ka iya amfani da waɗannan dapps don musanya ga ma'auni.
page-stablecoins-accordion-swap-editors-: Samowa kan ka walet wanda zai ba ku damar siyan ETH da kuma ku canza shi zuwa kuɗi, har da stablecoins, kai tsaye.
page-stablecoins-accordion-swap-requirem: Kuna buƙatar walet don ba da izinin musanyawa da adana kuɗin ku
page-stablecoins-accordion-swap-text-pre: Kuna iya karɓar mafi yawan stablecoins akan musaya maras wuri. Don haka zaku iya musanya kowane kuɗin da kuke da shi don stablecoin da kuke so.
page-stablecoins-algorithmic-con-1: Akwai buƙatar amincewa (ko iya karatu) algorithm.
page-stablecoins-algorithmic-con-2: Ragowar tsabar kuɗi zai canza bisa jimillar wadata.
page-stablecoins-algorithmic-description: Waɗannan stablecoins ba su da tallafi da kowane kadara. Madadin haka algorithm zai sayar da alamu idan farashin ya faɗi ƙasa da ƙimar da ake so kuma yana samar da alamun idan ƙimar ta wuce adadin da ake so. Saboda adadin waɗannan alamun da ke cikin kewayawa yana canzawa akai-akai, adadin alamun da kuka mallaka zai canza, amma koyaushe zai nuna rabonku.
page-stablecoins-algorithmic-disclaimer: Algorithmic stablecoins wasu fasahar gwaji ne. Ya kamata ku san haɗarin dake ciki kafin amfani da su.
page-stablecoins-algorithmic-pro-2: Algorithm na jama'a ne suke sarrafa shi.
page-stablecoins-bank-apy-source: Matsakaicin adadin da bankuna ke biya a asalin asusun ajiyar inshora na tarayyar, Amurka.
page-stablecoins-bitcoin-pizza-body: A shekara ta 2010, wani ya sayi pizzas 2 akan bitcoin 10,000. A lokacin waɗannan kudi suna da darajar ~ $41 USD. A kasuwar yau kuma miliyoyin daloli suke. Akwai da yawa irin ma'amaloli masu nadama a cikin tarihin Ethereum. Stablecoins suna magance wannan matsalar, don haka zaku iya jin daɗin pizza ku riƙe ETH ɗin ku.
page-stablecoins-coin-price-change: Canza farashin Coin (kwanaki 30 da suka gabata)
page-stablecoins-crypto-backed-con-1: Kasa wajen daidaito fiye da stablecoins masu goyon bayan fiat.
page-stablecoins-crypto-backed-con-2: Kuna buƙatar ku sa ido kan ƙimar jinginar kiripto.
page-stablecoins-crypto-backed-descripti: Wadannan stablecoins suna goyan bayan wasu kadarorin kiripto, kamar ETH. Farashin su ya dogara da ƙimar kadara mai tushe (ko jingina), wanda zai iya zama mara ƙarfi. Saboda darajar ETH na iya canzawa, waɗannan stablecoins an cika su da juna don tabbatar da farashin ya tsaya kamar yadda zai yiwu. Wannan yana nufin yana da kusanci a faɗi cewa $1 na goyon bayan stablecoin na crypto yana da ƙayyadaddun kadara na kiripto wanda ya kai aƙalla $2. Don haka idan farashin ETH ya ragu, dole ne a yi amfani da ƙarin ETH don dawo da stablecoins, in ba haka ba za su rasa ƙimar su.
page-stablecoins-crypto-backed-pro-1: A bayyane kuma da cikakken rarrabuwa.
page-stablecoins-crypto-backed-pro-2: Saurin juyawa zuwa sauran kadarorin kiript.
page-stablecoins-crypto-backed-pro-3: Babu masu kula na waje - duk kadarorin ana sarrafa su ta asusun Ethereum.
page-stablecoins-dai-banner-body: Watakila Dai shine mafi shaharar karkataccen stablecoin. Ƙimar sa kusan dala ɗaya ne kuma ana karɓar ta a ko'ina cikin dapps.
page-stablecoins-editors-choice-intro: Waɗanna mai yiwuwa da mafi sani misalai na stablecoins na gaskiya yanzu kuma da kuɗi muna samun sa da amfani a lokacin amfani da dapps.
page-stablecoins-fiat-backed-con-1: Na tsakiya – wani dole ya bayar da kuɗaɗe.
page-stablecoins-fiat-backed-con-2: Na buƙatar dubawa don tabatar da kamfanni ya tanada isar ajiya.
page-stablecoins-fiat-backed-description: Ainihin IOU (Ina bin ku) don kuɗin fiat na gargajiya (yawanci daloli). Kuna amfani da kuɗin fiat ɗin ku don siyan stablecoin wanda za ku iya shiga daga baya kuma ku fanshi don ainihin kuɗin ku.
page-stablecoins-find-stablecoin-intro: Akwai stablecoins da yawa da basu canzawa. Ga shawarar yadda zaka fara idan kai sabo ne game da Ethereum, na farko shine bincike.
page-stablecoins-hero-alt: Manya manyan stablecoin guda uku shahararru a kasuwanni sune: Dai, USDC, da kuma Tether.
page-stablecoins-hero-header: Kuɗin dijital na amfani a koda yaushe
page-stablecoins-hero-subtitle: Smara canzawa su ne kuɗin Ethereum waɗanda suke da farashin tsaye bai canzawa ko da farashin ETH ya canza.
page-stablecoins-meta-description: Gabatarwar stablecoins na Ethereum waɗanda ba su canzawa: menene su, ya ake samun su da kuma miye amfanin su.
page-stablecoins-precious-metals-con-1: Na tsakiya – wani dole ya bayar da kuɗaɗe.
page-stablecoins-precious-metals-con-2: Kana buƙatar amince da masu bada waɗannan kuɗaɗen da kuma inda ake tsare da ƙarafunar alfarmar.
page-stablecoins-precious-metals-descrip: Kamar kuɗin fiat, a maimakon haka waɗannan stablecoins suna amfani da abubuwa kamar zinariya don kula da ƙimar su.
page-stablecoins-prices-definition: Stablecoins sune cryptocurrencies ba tare da an canza ba. Suna da abubuwa iri ɗaya da yawa kamar ETH amma ƙimar su ta tsaya, kamar kudin gargajiya. Don haka kuna da damar samun tsayayyen kuɗi wanda zaku iya amfani da shi akan Ethereum.
page-stablecoins-research-warning: Ethereum sabon fasaha ce dakuma yawancin amfana. Tabbatar cewa kun san haɗarin da kuma ajiyar da kaɗai a ku iya hatsara.
page-stablecoins-save-stablecoins-body: Stablecoins sau da yawa suna da matsakaicin saman riba saboda akwai buƙatu da yawa wajen rance su. Akwai dapps waɗanda ke ba ku damar samun kuɗin ruwa da stablecoins a asalin lokacin ta hanyar saka su cikin haɗakar rance. Kamar dai a cikin bankin duniya, kuna ba da kuɗi ga masu ba da bashi amma kuna iya janye alamun ku da sha'awar ku a kowane lokaci.
page-stablecoins-saving: Sa ajiyar ku na stablecoin don amfani mai kyau kuma ku sami kuɗin ruwa. Kamar duk abin da ke cikin kiripto, Haɓaka Kashi na Shekara-shekara (APY) da aka amabta na iya canzawa kowace rana dangane da wadata/buƙata na asalin lokaci.
page-stablecoins-stablecoins-dapp-callou: Bincika dapps na Ethereum - stablecoins a galibi suna da amfani ga kasuwanci na yau da kullun.
page-stablecoins-stablecoins-dapp-descri: Kasuwanni don ɗimbin stablecins, gami da Dai, USDC, TUSD, USDT, da ƙari.
Ba da rancen stablecoins kuma a sami riba da $COMP kuɗin kai na Wuri.
Dandalin yin ciniki inda zaku sami kuɗin ruwa akan Dai da USDC ku.
Manhajar da aka ƙera don adana Dai.
page-stablecoins-stablecoins-feature-1: Stablecoins na duniya ne, kuma ana iya aika shi ta intanet. Suna da sauƙin karɓa ko aikawa da zarar kuna da asusun Ethereum.
page-stablecoins-stablecoins-feature-2: Buƙatar stablecoins na da girma, don haka zaku iya samun riba don ba da rancen ku. Tabbatar cewa kuna sane da haɗari kafin ba da rance.
page-stablecoins-stablecoins-feature-3: Stablecoins ana musayar su wa ETH da sauran kuɗin Ethereum. Yawancin dapps sun dogara akan stablecoins.
page-stablecoins-stablecoins-feature-4: Ana kiyaye Stablecoins ta hanyar cryptography. Babu wanda zai iya ƙirƙira kasuwanci a madadin ku.
page-stablecoins-stablecoins-meta-descri: Gabatarwar stablecoins na Ethereum waɗanda ba su canzawa: menene su, ya ake samun su da kuma miye amfanin su.
page-stablecoins-table-error: An kasa loda stablecoins. Gwada sake sabunta shafin.
page-stablecoins-top-coins: Kuɗi mafi yawa na jarin stablecoins na kasuwa
page-stablecoins-top-coins-intro-code: jimlar adadin kuɗin da ke wanzuwa an ninka ta da ƙimar kowace alama. Wannan jeri yana da ƙarfi kuma ayyukan da aka jerawa a nan ba lallai ba ne ƙungiyar ethereum.org ta amince da su.
page-stablecoins-usdc-banner-body: Watakila USDC shine mafi shaharar kuɗin stablecoin. Ƙimar sa kusan dala ɗaya ne daga Circle da Coinbase da suke tallafa masa.
page-stablecoins-why-stablecoins-body: ETH, kamar dai Bitcoin, yana da farashi mai canzawa saboda sabuwar fasaha ce. Don haka wataƙila ba za ku so ku kashe shi akai-akai ba. Stablecoins suna madubin darajar agogo na gargajiya don ba ku dama ga tsayayyen kuɗi wanda zaku iya amfani da su akan Ethereum.
page-stablecoins-more-defi-button: Ƙari akan kuɗin da aka raba ko'ina (DeFi)
page-stablecoins-tools-stablecoinswtf-de: Stablecoins.wtf yana ba da shafin sarrafawa tare da bayanan kasuwa na tarihi, ƙididdiga, da abun ciki na ilimi don fitattun stablecoins.
